title.zh: next-dynamic-forms - React/Next.js 动态表单解决方案

description.en: next-dynamic-forms is a flexible, extensible dynamic form package for React and Next.js. This documentation site provides comprehensive guides, real-world demos, and best practices for building multi-step, multi-language, and highly customizable forms.
description.zh: next-dynamic-forms 是一个灵活可扩展的 React/Next.js 动态表单组件库。本网站为其官方文档，提供详细用法说明、真实案例演示和最佳实践，助您快速构建多步骤、多语言、高度自定义的表单。

en: Dynamic form rendering based on JSON configuration
Easy integration with React and Next.js projects
zh: 基于 JSON 配置的动态表单渲染
轻松集成到 React/Next.js 项目
高度可定制的界面与校验
详尽文档与真实案例演示
